required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effectiveness of ABT-450/r - Ombitasvir, + Dasabuvir, ± Ribavirin in Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C -An Observational Study in Ireland
clinical_study.official_title: Real World Evidence of the Effectiveness of ABT-450/r - Ombitasvir, + Dasabuvir, ± Ribavirin in Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C -An Observational Study in Ireland

brief_summary.textblock: This study seeks to determine the effectiveness of the interferon-free ABBVIE REGIMEN ± RBV in chronic hepatitis C virus infected participants across Ireland.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of participants achieving 12 Week sustained virologic response (SVR12)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 12 weeks after last dose of study drug
primary_outcome.description: SVR12 is defined as hepatitis C virus ribonucleic acid (HCV RNA) level less than 50 IU/mL 12 weeks (i.e. at least 70 days) after the last actual dose of the ABBVIE REGIMEN.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients with virological response at end of treatment (EOT)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: End of Treatment 12 or 24 week treatment regimen
secondary_outcome.description: Virological response is defined as hepatitis C virus ribonucleic acid (HCV RNA) levels less then 50 IU/mL at EoT.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of participants who experienced breakthrough.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Throughout the study for approximately 2 years
secondary_outcome.description: Breakthrough is defined as at least one documented hepatitis C virus ribonucleic acid (HCV RNA) levels less than 50 IU/mL followed by HCV RNA greater than or equal to 50 IU/mL during treatment.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of participants with relapse at end of treatment (EoT)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: End of Treatment 12 or 24 week treatment regimen
secondary_outcome.description: Relapse is defined as hepatitis C virus ribonucleic acid (HCV RNA) levels less than 50 IU/mL at EoT followed by HCV RNA greater than or equal to 50 IU/mL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients meeting any of the non-response categories of 12 Week sustained virologic response (SVR12)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 12 weeks after last dose of study drug
secondary_outcome.description: The SVR12 non-response categories are on-treatment virologic failure, failure to suppress, relapse, premature study drug discontinuation with no on-treatment virologic failure, missing SVR12 data, and/or none of the above criteria.

arm_group.description: Participants with chronic hepatitis C who are being treated with the AbbVie Regimen +/- Ribavarin.

study_pop.textblock: Patients with chronic hepatitis C who are being prescribed the AbbVie Regimen +/- Ribavarin.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Treatment-naïve or -experienced participants with confirmed CHC, genotype 1, receiving combination therapy with the interferon-free ABBVIE REGIMEN ± RBV according to standard of care and in line with the current local label
- If RBV is co-administered with the ABBVIE REGIMEN, it has been prescribed in line with the current local label
- Participants must not be participating or intending to participate in a concurrent interventional therapeutic trial
Exclusion Criteria:
